response.answer_text: The actual google definition of corporal punishment is: cor·po·ral pun·ish·ment ˈkôrp(ə)rəl ˈpəniSHmənt/ noun noun: corporal punishment; plural noun: corporal punishment physical punishment, such as caning or flogging.punishment under law that includes imprisonment and death. To put it simply, corporal punishment is the physical act of striking another person (usually a child) to cause pain for the sole purpose of punishment.

The Committee on the Rights of the Child in the General Comment No. 8 defines ‘corporal’ or ‘physical’ punishment as, “any punishment in which physical force is used and intended to cause some degree of pain or discomfort, however light. Most involves hitting (“smacking”, “slapping”, “spanking”) children, with the hand or with an implement ……. In the view of the Committee, corporal punishment is invariably degrading.
